title: Soracha Vegetarian
description: Menu is 95% vegan. Specializes in regional northern specialties. Menu changes substantially from day-to-day depending on availability and the owner/chef's ideas of what to make. Try the bamboo shoot stuffed with veggie pork; veggie steak; fermented mushroom grapao. No Wi-Fi or English spoken.
streetAddress: Somphot Chiang Mai 700 Pii Rd, On the second Ring Road, about 300 meters north from the promenada intersection
